prompts.inDev: This feature is still in development.

prompts.alreadyRegistered: You have already created an account.
prompts.enterCredentials: Enter your email and password to access your account
prompts.logOut: Are you sure you want to log out?

descriptions.confirmLogOut: Use this dialog to log out of your account.

descriptions.create: Submit a proposal for this room to discuss and vote on.

descriptions.guestAccess: People with supported clients will be able to join the room without having a registered account.
descriptions.roomAccess: Controls who can join. Public allows anyone to join, while private requires members to be invited.
descriptions.discoverability: Determines whether this room appears in the public room directory.
descriptions.roomName: This is the name that will be displayed for your chat room.
descriptions.settings: Manage the settings for your chat room.
descriptions.visibility: Public rooms can be found in the room directory. Private rooms require an invitation.

prompts.roomTopic: Provide a brief description of the room's purpose.
prompts.startConversation: Start a conversation with your friends or colleagues.
prompts.leaveRoom: Are you sure you want to leave the room '{{roomName}}'? You'll need to be re-invited if the room is private.

toasts.roomCreatedErrorDescription: There was a problem creating your room. Please try again.
toasts.roomUpdatedErrorDescription: There was a problem updating your room. Please try again.

errors.roomNameMax: Room name must not exceed 50 characters.
errors.roomNameMin: Room name must be at least 3 characters.

messages.projectDescription1: Praxis is an open source messaging platform designed for collaborative decision making. Proposals take center stage, offering a diverse range of voting models, with consensus as the default.
messages.projectDescription2: With Praxis, communities are empowered to collectively shape crucial aspects such as server name, settings, roles, and the planning of real-world events. This flexibility allows for diverse and dynamic social structures tailored to meet the specific needs of your community as it evolves over time.
messages.inDev: This project is still in development and is not yet intended for serious use outside of testing or research purposes.

descriptions.navDrawer: Create a new room, join a room, or view your settings.
descriptions.navSheet: Navigate to your rooms, profile, and more.
